resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit?
Your changes will not be saved, and the board will be reset.
The goal of Sudoku is to fill a 9 by 9 grid of numbers so that each digit from 1 to 9 appears once in each of the 9 rows, columns, and 3 by 3 regions.
First, select an empty cell by tapping on it. Once you have selected a cell, it will be darkened.

Next, place a digit in the selected cell by tapping one of the digit buttons at the bottom. If the digit is incorrect, the digit will be red, and your phone will vibrate. You can erase a digit from a cell by selecting that cell and then tapping the backspace button to the right of the digit buttons. Be careful! Depending on the difficulty level you are playing on, your game will end after a certain number of incorrect digits.
